recipesJson.name: Newps menthol ejuice
recipesJson.author: DaddyKane91
recipesJson.description: This is a pretty good mix, it is really close to the Black Note Solo, I didn't know it until tonight, I made this trial vape 2 weeks ago before I bought the solo mix... And I wanted to make an all FLV mix as well.. I hope all who try it enjoy it.. I was a menthol tobacco smoker before I started vaping.. And this could very well be my goto vape.......
